* Diana laughed as Rion fell to the ground in a puff of sand, keeping her 
paws firmly on his chest as she smiled down at him, with an expression that 
said, ' i always get you.'
She wriggled the toes on her paws and tapped her cloaws against Rion, 
letting him know that he was very volnerable on his back like this.
Diana snickered evily.*

" Let you up? Why? So you can tackle me? Fat chance!"

* She wiggled her toes to try and tickle Rion a bit before she finally 
decided that she would let up.
Diana backed off a bit and stood there watching him, keeping her face 
towards him.
Even though she was never trained in combat because her parents wanted her 
to grow up to be the proper ladylike princess, she knew a few things.
Mostly from either fighting with Rion or listening to his instructor when he 
was in class.
And keeping your eye on the enemy was #1.
But Diana still snickered at the sound of Rions whine, knowing that he was 
trying to sound tough but it didn't work.
Though, she had to work on her roar too, so they were basically in the same 
boat.*
